root: ^Well, Mr. Stone. I think you did it. I'm giving you the chance to come clean.
^Sweetie, all I've done is eat a fine meal.
^Mr. Stone, you clearly do not want to talk.
^I'm talking to you right now. I'd love to talk to you more, even.
^I stole nothing. I don't know what you're talking about.
^Oh! Did you find it? I lost it.
